description: Ontology for vCard based on RFC6350
label: Ontology for vCard

RelatedType.description: Used for relation type codes. The URI of the relation type code must be used as the value for the Relation Type.
RelatedType.label: Relation Type

Address.description: To specify the components of the delivery address for the  object
Address.label: Address

TelephoneType.description: Used for telephone type codes. The URI of the telephone type code must be used as the value for the Telephone Type.
TelephoneType.label: Phone

Type.description: Used for type codes. The URI of the type code must be used as the value for Type.
Type.label: Type

Email.description: To specify the electronic mail address for communication with the object the vCard represents. Use the hasEmail object property.
Email.label: Email

Gender.description: Used for gender codes. The URI of the gender code must be used as the value for Gender.
Gender.label: Gender

Group.description: Object representing a group of persons or entities.  A group object will usually contain hasMember properties to specify the members of the group.
Group.label: Group

Kind.description: The parent class for all objects
Kind.label: Kind

Individual.description: An object representing a single person or entity
Individual.label: Individual

Location.description: An object representing a named geographical place
Location.label: Location

Organization.description: An object representing an organization.  An organization is a single entity, and might represent a business or government, a department or division within a business or government, a club, an association, or the like.
Organization.label: Organization

Home.description: This implies that the property is related to an individual's personal life
Home.label: Home

VCard.description: The vCard class is  equivalent to the new Kind class, which is the parent for the four explicit types of vCards (Individual, Organization, Location, Group)
VCard.label: VCard

Name.description: To specify the components of the name of the object
Name.label: Name

Tel.description: This class is deprecated. Use the hasTelephone object property.
Tel.label: Tel

Work.description: This implies that the property is related to an individual's work place
Work.label: Work

additional-name.description: The additional name associated with the object
additional-name.label: additional name

anniversary.description: The date of marriage, or equivalent, of the object
anniversary.label: anniversary

bday.description: To specify the birth date of the object
bday.label: birth date

category.description: The category information about the object, also known as tags
category.label: category

class.description: This data property has been deprecated
class.label: class

country-name.description: The country name associated with the address of the object
country-name.label: country name

extended-address.description: This data property has been deprecated
extended-address.label: extended address

family-name.description: The family name associated with the object
family-name.label: family name

fn.description: The formatted text corresponding to the name of the object
fn.label: formatted name

given-name.description: The given name associated with the object
given-name.label: given name

nickname.description: The nick name associated with the object
nickname.label: nickname

honorific-prefix.description: The honorific prefix of the name associated with the object
honorific-prefix.label: honorific prefix

honorific-suffix.description: The honorific suffix of the name associated with the object
honorific-suffix.label: honorific suffix

label.description: This data property has been deprecated
label.label: label

language.description: To specify the language that may be used for contacting the object. May also be used as a property parameter.
language.label: language

latitude.description: This data property has been deprecated. See hasGeo
latitude.label: latitude

locality.description: The locality (e.g. city or town) associated with the address of the object
locality.label: locality

longitude.description: This data property has been deprecated. See hasGeo
longitude.label: longitude

mailer.description: This data property has been deprecated
mailer.label: mailer

note.description: A note associated with the object
note.label: note

organization-name.description: To specify the organizational name associated with the object
organization-name.label: organization name

organization-unit.description: To specify the organizational unit name associated with the object
organization-unit.label: organizational unit name

post-office-box.description: This data property has been deprecated
post-office-box.label: post office box

postal-code.description: The postal code associated with the address of the object
postal-code.label: postal code

prodid.description: To specify the identifier for the product that created the object
prodid.label: product id

region.description: The region (e.g. state or province) associated with the address of the object
region.label: region

rev.description: To specify revision information about the object
rev.label: revision

role.description: To specify the function or part played in a particular situation by the object
role.label: role

sort-string.description: To specify the string to be used for national-language-specific sorting. Used as a property parameter only.
sort-string.label: sort as

street-address.description: The street address associated with the address of the object
street-address.label: street address

title.description: To specify the position or job of the object
title.label: title

tz.description: To indicate time zone information that is specific to the object. May also be used as a property parameter.
tz.label: time zone

value.description: Used to indicate the literal value of a data property that requires property parameters
value.label: value

adr.description: This object property has been mapped
adr.label: address

hasAddress.description: To specify the components of the delivery address for the object
hasAddress.label: has address

agent.description: This object property has been deprecated
agent.label: agent

email.description: This object property has been mapped
email.label: email

hasEmail.description: To specify the electronic mail address for communication with the object
hasEmail.label: has email

geo.description: This object property has been mapped
geo.label: geo

hasGeo.description: To specify information related to the global positioning of the object. May also be used as a property parameter.
hasGeo.label: has geo

hasAdditionalName.description: Used to support property parameters for the additional name data property
hasAdditionalName.label: has additional name

hasCalendarBusy.description: To specify the busy time associated with the object. (Was called FBURL in RFC6350)
hasCalendarBusy.label: has calendar busy

hasCalendarLink.description: To specify the calendar associated with the object. (Was called CALURI in RFC6350)
hasCalendarLink.label: has calendar link

hasCalendarRequest.description: To specify the calendar user address to which a scheduling request be sent for the object. (Was called CALADRURI in RFC6350)
hasCalendarRequest.label: has calendar request

hasCategory.description: Used to support property parameters for the category data property
hasCategory.label: has category

hasCountryName.description: Used to support property parameters for the country name data property
hasCountryName.label: has country name

hasFN.description: Used to support property parameters for the formatted name data property
hasFN.label: has formatted name

hasFamilyName.description: Used to support property parameters for the family name data property
hasFamilyName.label: has family name

hasGender.description: To specify  the sex or gender identity of the object. URIs are recommended to enable interoperable sex and gender codes to be used.
hasGender.label: has gender

hasGivenName.description: Used to support property parameters for the given name data property
hasGivenName.label: has given name

hasHonorificPrefix.description: Used to support property parameters for the honorific prefix data property
hasHonorificPrefix.label: has honorific prefix

hasHonorificSuffix.description: Used to support property parameters for the honorific suffix data property
hasHonorificSuffix.label: has honorific suffix

hasInstantMessage.description: To specify the instant messaging and presence protocol communications with the object. (Was called IMPP in RFC6350)
hasInstantMessage.label: has messaging

hasKey.description: To specify a public key or authentication certificate associated with the object
hasKey.label: has key

key.description: This object property has been mapped
key.label: key

hasLanguage.description: Used to support property parameters for the language data property
hasLanguage.label: has language

hasLocality.description: Used to support property parameters for the locality data property
hasLocality.label: has locality

hasLogo.description: To specify a graphic image of a logo associated with the object
hasLogo.label: has logo

logo.description: This object property has been mapped
logo.label: logo

hasMember.description: To include a member in the group this object represents. (This property can only be used by Group individuals)
hasMember.label: has member

hasName.description: To specify the components of the name of the object
hasName.label: has name

n.description: This object property has been mapped
n.label: name

hasNickname.description: Used to support property parameters for the nickname data property
hasNickname.label: has nickname

hasNote.description: Used to support property parameters for the note data property
hasNote.label: has note

hasOrganizationName.description: Used to support property parameters for the organization name data property
hasOrganizationName.label: has organization name

hasOrganizationUnit.description: Used to support property parameters for the organization unit name data property
hasOrganizationUnit.label: has organization unit name

hasPhoto.description: To specify an image or photograph information that annotates some aspect of the object
hasPhoto.label: has photo

photo.description: This object property has been mapped
photo.label: photo

hasPostalCode.description: Used to support property parameters for the postal code data property
hasPostalCode.label: has postal code

hasRegion.description: Used to support property parameters for the region data property
hasRegion.label: has region

hasRelated.description: To specify a relationship between another entity and the entity represented by this object
hasRelated.label: has related

hasRole.description: Used to support property parameters for the role data property
hasRole.label: has role

hasSound.description: To specify a digital sound content information that annotates some aspect of the object
hasSound.label: has sound

sound.description: This object property has been mapped
sound.label: sound

hasSource.description: To identify the source of directory information of the object
hasSource.label: has source

hasStreetAddress.description: Used to support property parameters for the street address data property
hasStreetAddress.label: has street address

hasTelephone.description: To specify the telephone number for telephony communication with the object
hasTelephone.label: has telephone

tel.description: This object property has been mapped
tel.label: telephone

hasTitle.description: Used to support property parameters for the title data property
hasTitle.label: has title

hasUID.description: To specify a value that represents a globally unique identifier corresponding to the object
hasUID.label: has uid

hasURL.description: To specify a uniform resource locator associated with the object
hasURL.label: has url

url.description: This object property has been mapped
url.label: url

hasValue.description: Used to indicate the resource value of an object property that requires property parameters
hasValue.label: has value

org.description: This object property has been mapped. Use the organization-name data property.
org.label: organization
